name: Christmas lights for Tumblr icons
description:
Decorate the "new post" icons with Christmas lights. Ho ho ho!
(And, Style 80517)
additional_info: Only Firefox will blink the lights - Chrome won't animate generated content like :before and :after. Lights will blink in Chrome now, too. (Yay!) ... Well, the "new post" icons now blink on and off with the green bulbs, but I'll leave that for now. Hurrah! We have enough bulbs again, thanks to Tumblr's updates. It would be nice to have more patterns, though. Decorate the avatars, too, with Style 80517 And Userstyles.org with style 80531

style_setting_options.label: On and off
style_setting_options.value:
-webkit-animation: blink 2.5s steps(1,end) infinite;
    animation: blink 2.5s steps(1,end) infinite;
